review: It was better before they neutered it. The "updates" cut down on the features. Look it up on the internet for full explanation. I also dislike the way it phones home once a day. I use a HDMI switch as I only have two HDMI inputs to my TV and need five. So my HDMI switch will go to the active device. This means when I am using my Roku or DVD player to stream, the darn Chromescast will phone home and take over. One minute I am watching Netflix via Roku and the next the Chromecast screen saver. Very irritating, Chromecast only phones home once a day so often I never even notice it, but when it does, its a pain.
